name: Zaklęta Wyspa
overview: Zaklęta Wyspa is a puzzle-solving game with elements of adventure story. The game begins with the kidnapping of Princess Andora by the evil sorcerer. Mendor unleashed an army of demons to conquer villages in the kingdom of Aldeoria. Now, each of thirty villages, is possessed by a demon. The daemon can be defeated only by solving a logical mini task. The game allows to select training and adventure mode. Training mode features all the thirty tasks with unlimited access. The adventure mode is played on the kingdom map, where the player moves from one village to another using the roads. Accessing new villages requires passing the trial in current village. Succeeded trial unlocks the road and allows to choose one of available direction. The puzzles are based on logic, chess, mathematics rules or a well known board games, such as master mind, domino or ships.
